      • loadClassFromApplicationInfo

        protected <T> Class<? extends T> loadClassFromApplicationInfo(Class<T> typeNeeded,
                                                              String metaDataKey,
                                                              ApplicationInfo info)
        Loads a class of given type for a given key from the application meta-data.
        Parameters:
        typeNeeded - the type the class should be assignable from
        metaDataKey - the name of the meta-data entry
        info - the application info
        Returns:
        The loaded class, or null if there was no entry or an error occurred.
